description:
Kanshi saves Keigo from getting his sneakers stolen. The person who attacked him used a candy called "Drop," which has a stimulant effect that amplifies one`s strength and desires. They learn that a person named "Wolf" was distributing this candy, and the ones using this candy to go berserk are called "Dogs." Later, a witch named Nemu Miyao appears before Nico and Morihito.
Source: Crunchyroll
